name: Between (DrimTiGames)
description:
DrimTiGames is a team composed by students from the authors of Blasphemous, the successful metroidvania developed by the Sevillian studio, The Game Kitchen. After taking a Level Design course in 2019 taught by Enrique Colinet and Maikel Ortega (designers of Blasphemous), four of the students joined together to carry out a prototype made as a final project, which ended up becoming "Between".

Follow us on @drimtigames 

Twitter: https://twitter.com/drimtigames

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/drimtigames/

Subscribe DrimTiGames´ Youtube Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCUv_8D9VRSP6oSdxyOBc77A?view_as=subscriber

Join our Discord server: https://discord.gg/5tMZHDX

Contact: drimtigames@gmail.com
